channel.title: CVE Feed for Broadcom -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Broadcom -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4336|2024-10-08T19:38:10.743Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not safeguard cookies with Secure attribute

item.title: CVE-2023-4326|2024-10-08T18:03:09.590Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable has an insecure default TLS configuration that supports obsolete SHA1-based ciphersuites

item.title: CVE-2023-4333|2024-10-08T19:34:36.730Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface doesnâ€™t enforce SSL cipher ordering by server

item.title: CVE-2023-4343|2024-10-08T20:03:56.153Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to exposure of sensitive password information in the URL as a URL search parameter

item.title: CVE-2023-4335|2024-10-08T19:37:21.254Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller Web server (nginx) is serving private server-side files without any authentication on Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-4327|2024-10-08T18:05:12.166Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of sensitive data and the keys used for encryption are accessible to any local user on Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-4323|2024-10-08T20:05:12.818Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to improper session management of active sessions on Gateway setup

item.title: CVE-2023-4337|2024-10-08T19:39:39.529Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to improper session handling of managed servers on Gateway installation

item.title: CVE-2023-4331|2024-10-08T18:25:44.197Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable has an insecure default TLS configuration that support obsolete and vulnerable TLS protocols

item.title: CVE-2023-4332|2024-10-08T18:29:50.058Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to Improper permissions on the log file

item.title: CVE-2023-4341|2024-10-08T19:43:58.895Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller is vulnerable to Privilege escalation to root due to creation of insecure folders by Web GUI

item.title: CVE-2023-4339|2024-10-08T19:41:58.772Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of private keys used for CIM stored with insecure file permissions

item.title: CVE-2023-4344|2024-10-08T19:26:09.035Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to insufficient randomness due to improper use of ssl.rnd to setup CIM connection

item.title: CVE-2023-4340|2024-10-08T19:43:09.978Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller is vulnerable to Privilege escalation by taking advantage of the Session prints in the log file

item.title: CVE-2023-4342|2024-10-08T20:02:31.717Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure defaults of lacking HTTP strict-transport-security policy

item.title: CVE-2023-4328|2024-10-08T18:19:19.727Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of sensitive data and the keys used for encryption are accessible to any local user on Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-4325|2024-10-08T18:00:04.293Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to usage of Libcurl with LSA has known vulnerabilities

item.title: CVE-2023-4334|2024-10-08T19:35:21.552Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller Web server (nginx) is serving private files without any authentication

item.title: CVE-2023-4345|2024-10-08T20:17:59.774Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable client-side control bypass leads to unauthorized data access for low privileged user

item.title: CVE-2023-4329|2024-10-08T18:22:13.644Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not safeguard SESSIONID cookie with SameSite attribute

item.title: CVE-2023-4338|2024-10-08T19:40:23.085Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not provide X-Content-Type-Options Headers

item.title: CVE-2023-4324|2024-10-08T17:57:24.262Z -- broadcom -- lsi%20storage%20authority%20%28lsa%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure defaults of lacking HTTP Content-Security-Policy headers

item.title: CVE-2024-36459|2024-08-02T03:37:05.267Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20siteminder
item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-36457|2024-08-02T03:37:05.380Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to bypass the authentication requirements for a specific PAM endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-36455|2024-08-02T03:37:05.159Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: An improper input validation allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-36456|2024-08-02T03:37:05.337Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by uploading a specially crafted PAM upgrade file.

item.title: CVE-2024-36458|2024-08-02T03:37:05.159Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to perform server upgrade related actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-38494|2024-07-16T14:42:36.168Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows a high-privileged authenticated PAM user to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to perform server upgrade related actions.

item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to perform server upgrade related actions.

item.description: This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by uploading a specially crafted PAM upgrade file.

item.description: The vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary information from the database.

item.description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to bypass the authentication requirements for a specific PAM endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-36459|2024-06-18T16:44:41.186Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20siteminder
item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38494|2024-07-15T14:03:53.924Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows a high-privileged authenticated PAM user to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38495|2024-07-15T14:13:12.364Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: A specific authentication strategy allows a malicious attacker to learn ids of all PAM users defined in its database.

item.title: CVE-2024-38496|2024-07-15T14:45:45.952Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to access information about other PAM users and their group memberships.

item.title: CVE-2024-38493|2024-07-15T14:26:27.341Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the PAM UI web interface. A remote attacker able to convince a PAM user to click on a specially crafted link to the PAM UI web interface could potentially execute arbitrary client-side code in the context of PAM UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-36455|2024-07-15T14:48:53.051Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: An improper input validation allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.description: A specific authentication strategy allows a malicious attacker to learn ids of all PAM users defined in its database.
